Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product not only meets but exceeds industry standards, providing unparalleled performance and durability. Given its high-quality features and craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, we're offering this exceptional item at an introductory price of $200. We're confident it will meet and surpass your expectations. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. Let us know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
